archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Aggregate/Combine Party Bill/Invoice
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Aggregate and/or combine a number bills/invoices specific to a party for a specific period.

properties.value: Aggregate/Combine Party Bill/Invoice aggregates and/or combines a number invoices for a specific period for a party. Aggregation entails a multiple number of invoices , corrections, revenue shares, memos, credit notes and adjustments received over a determined time, where the period are contractually determined (monthly cannot be assumed).
